Localization.Name: Dust Devil Arms Epoque
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Heavy Armor
Damage Reduction: 40%
Temp. Rating: -85 / 115 °C
Radiation Protection: 26800 REM
Radiation Scrub Rate: 145.8 REM/s

Reinforced alloys are carefully layered to recreate the appearance of warriors from Humanity's past to create an armor that's intimidating and functional.

The Epoque edition features a navy and black coloring, finished with baroque gold detailing.
